moveObject(Ball, double, double, double, double) - Method in class ObjectMotion
If the object is going to hit a wall, this method deflects the object and absorbs a portion of the objects momentum The first thing the function does is calculate the position the object will be in if it continues on its current trajectory.

Player - Class in Unnamed Package
Controls player piece motion and notifies GameController thread if a player enters own goal / latches 2 magnets.

If the player collides with the ball, deflect the ball and move the player in the direction of the ball's deflection

playerUpdate(boolean[]) - Method in class Player
